attributes.action: confirm that the people who 'overreacted' by redacting far too much information from the MPs expenses claims and receipts published yesterday, have been sacked.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On Question Time last night two sitting MPs and Lord Falconer stated that what had gone on was not the responsibility of MPs but was done entirely on the responsibility of the Fees Office Staff.  If this is true then it is the Fees Office Staff who are entirely responsible for the level of fraud which is going on and they should therefore be instantly dismissed without severance pay or pension - unless those payments are to be funded personally by the MPs they have protected from oversight by the taxpayer for so long.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
